scripts.fetch:all: set -e; node scripts/boundary.js && node scripts/counters.js && node scripts/cycleway.js && node scripts/ncn.js && node scripts/embedded_tram_tracks.js && node scripts/pumps.js && node scripts/wayfinding.js && node scripts/parking.js && node scripts/dft_collisions.js && node scripts/asl.js && node scripts/shops.js && node scripts/gritting.js && node scripts/bike_thefts.js && node scripts/signs.js && node scripts/lcn.js
scripts.serve: npm run build && npx serve public --single --listen 4173
